text.section: Appeals from orders issued under subsection (1) of this section shall be taken as provided in Subtitle 2 of this chapter.
Nothing contained in this section shall affect the right of the commissioner to impose any other penalties or corrective action provided for under laws administered by the commissioner.
Nothing contained in KRS 304.3-500 to 304.3-570 is intended to or shall in any manner limit or restrict the rights of policyholders, claimants, and auditors.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 986, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 6, effective July 14, 1992.
